text: Another Time, Another Place was a hit for Engelbert Humperdinck in 1971. It also charted in various other countries. ==Background== The song was written by Mike Leander & Eddie Seago. It was an unsuccessful entrant in a concert, but it would later find success with Engelbert Humperdinck.Radio Times, Volume 194, G. Newnes, 1972 - Page 4Tom Jones: Close Up, By Lucy Ellis - - - It was released in the UK on Decca (F 13212) in August 1971,45Cat - Engelbert Humperdinck - Discography, UK and in the US on Parrot (45-40065).454Cat - Engelbert Humperdinck - Discography, US ==Chart performance== In 1971, the song peaked at No. 13 in the UK and No. 43 in the US. It also made No. 5 on the US Adult Contemporary chart.Music VF.com - Another Time, Another Place For the week ending November 27, 1971, Billboard recorded its chart positions at No. 10 in Belgium, No. 34 in Britain, No. 2 in Malaysia and No. 2 in Singapore.Billboard, November 27, 1971 - Page 60 Billboard HITS OF THE WORLD ==References== Category:1971 singles Category:1971 songs Category:Engelbert Humperdinck songs Category:Songs written by Mike Leander
